title: Episode 116: Experiencing Homelessness: A Conversation of Hope with Beth Hudak
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, our hosts talk with Beth Hudak, the Director of Community Engagement at House of Hope, an emergency shelter supporting youth and families with children experiencing homelessness.  We learn some startling statistics about youth experiencing homelessness and ways that we can advocate in our communities.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, our hosts talk with Beth Hudak, â€¦
description: In this episode, our hosts talk with Beth Hudak, the Director of Community Engagement at House of Hope, an emergency shelter supporting youth and families with children experiencing homelessness.  We learn some startling statistics about youth experiencing homelessness and ways that we can advocate in our communities.
